title: Lavish China Escape in the Heart of Shenyang City
description: Uncover a contemporary metropolis blessed with a lush inner-city park when you stay at the Crowne Plaza Shenyang Parkview, an IHG Hotel. This glowing city, the largest in China's north-east, is buzzing with people, cuisines, and history and this modern hotel sits in the middle of it all, offering a fulfilling and satisfying escape. Work your way through three restaurants and bars or languish in the indoor heated pool.
offer_address: No. 88, Huanghe Nan Street, Huanggu District, Shenyang, 110031, China
